label: 埴輪
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: ceramic jars, sometimes in animal and anthropomorphic shapes, that were placed around mounded tombs (kofun 古墳) in the pre-ritsuryô Kofun age (~300-600 C.E.). [律令]
